channel.title: Are You A Christian
channel.description: Are You A Christian I Am

item.title: Are You A Christian
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Adam Adam
item.description:
@Mod_Adam wrote:

[quote=“Bang Train, post:43, topic:125933”][quote author=Mod Adam link=topic=176215.msg1626700#msg1626700 date=1185344708]

Imo, the things that people claim about christianity and shit, is totally outrageous. So, no.

and its used to spread peoples personal opinions

ex.
church 1: homosexuals will burn in hell
church 2: god loves every1
church 3: homosexuals are fine, but they can’t marry cause thats sacred

hmmm…so much for every1 teaching the same thing from the same book

Everyone teaches things differently. Are you going to come across two science teachers who teach the same thing? Are you going to come across two News Crews who express the same things? No.

Christian here. Sorry if this is old
[/quote]
actually for science teachers, its usually the exact same material

but if they are preaching from the bible, doesnt the bible state specifically about homosexuals? so should they all be preaching the same thing?[/quote]
But you have to remember, certain teachers use the same book and still teach different things?

EDIT: I really don’t want to get into an argument over something that I posted. There’s really no need for it, I was just expressing my views.

Read full topic

item.title: Are You A Christian
item.dc:creator: @3.65_kilos 3.65 kilos
item.description:
@3.65_kilos wrote:

Not Christian…

I have nothing against the religion itself, but the people that constantly push it on me are annoying. They should learn to leave me be.
I have a religion, but it’s nowhere close to Christianity.

Religion(in my opinion) is pointless, all it does it divide the world by different beliefs, where as some of the are completely stupid(Be Christian, god will love you. Be Jew, god will love you. Yet they hate each other?). Although, I do respect the constitution, freedom to religion.

Jews and Christians dont hate each other i have a friend that is a jew[/quote]

item.description:

BobDole81:

Nope…I’m Sikh.

item.title: Are You A Christian
item.dc:creator: @juju juju
item.description:
@juju wrote:

[quote=“Tribal, post:33, topic:125933”][quote author=juju link=topic=176215.msg1620090#msg1620090 date=1185101706]
I’m against the entire idea of theistic religions(eg; cristianity, islam - intelligent design and such), theistic religion as a whole gets more respect then it deserves.

Actually, I’m against pretty much any religion that promotes the “if you are good, you will be happy. if you are bad, you’ll be tortured forever” mentality - that kind of stuff can have pretty dramatic effects on young children which can effectivly brain wash them.
[/quote]
You think if you are bad and do bad things you’re going to live a happy life?
Its all about KARMA my friend.[/quote]

Yes. Those beliefs are bad. The theory of “karma” and “sins” is bad.

Children should be free to choose what religion they want to partake in - if any, without some fear of being royally fucked if they mess up and do something bad.

Read full topic

item.title: Are You A Christian
item.dc:creator: @mwiebelhaus mwiebelhaus
item.description:
@mwiebelhaus wrote:

[quote=“lordslayer565, post:35, topic:125933”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=176215.msg1619778#msg1619778 date=1185087191]

Imo, the things that people claim about christianity and shit, is totally outrageous. So, no.

Hes not liberal lol
and its used to spread peoples personal opinions

What is that? Looks like a personal opinion to me.

Why do people who have no religion always feel the need to try to convince people that do have a religion that they are somehow wrong or stupid? I don’t judge people who do not have religion, nor do I try to convince them that they should have a religion. Believe what you want to believe, but don’t put down other people.
[/quote]

Same. and yes im a catholic. BTW just wondering moparisthebest are you a true catholic or a liberal one?[/quote]

Read full topic
